attributes.action: BAN BEHEADING & DEATH VIDEO'S FROM FACEBOOK
attributes.additional_details:
Anyone can view video's of be-headings & death on Facebook. This deeply disturbs me that they can be viewed by anyone including children!! This needs to end immediately
Please support and help to get a ban on these kind of disgusting and disturbing video's

rejection.details: Facebook is responsible for its content, and has withdrawn such videos.
